metadata.title: CVE-2023-47210 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Improper input validation for some Intel(R) PROSet/Wireless WiFi softwarefor linux before version 23.20 may allow an unauthenticated user topotentially enable denial of service via adjacent access.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
